column1: I never get angry, even when someone treats me badly
I have never cheated on a test
I have never said anything negative about someone behind their back
I always follow the rules, even when no one is watching
I have never felt envious of someone else's good fortune
I have never told a lie, even for a good reason
I always help others, even when it requires personal sacrifice
I have never taken advantage of anyone, even in small ways
I have never had unkind or bad thoughts about anyone
If I make a mistake, I am always the first to admit it without making excuses
